meanings.sent1: The legislators gathered to discuss new laws for the city.
meanings.sent2: The legislators voted on the proposed bill in the parliament.
meanings.sent3: The legislators had a pizza party to brainstorm new rules.
meanings.sent4: The legislators are the architects of our society's regulations.
meanings.sent5: The legislators diligently craft the legal framework of our community.

meanings.definition: A member of a legislative body.
meanings.sent1: She was elected as one of the legislators in the state assembly.
meanings.sent2: The legislators debated the budget allocation in the council meeting.
meanings.sent3: The legislators organized a talent show during the legislative session.
meanings.sent4: The legislators are the gears that keep the government machinery running smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The legislators work together to represent the voices of their constituents.
